briefTitle: Personalised Program for Women Treated for Hodgkin Disease
officialTitle: Personalised Program for Women Treated for Hodgkin Disease : Risk Evaluation of Breast Cancer and Intensive Screening Program for Women at High Risk of Breast Cancer. PROPER/IPC 2010-001
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women \> 18 years
* treated for Hodgkin disease
* signed informed consent
* high risk of breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients unable to have a regular follow-up
